modName: Dovahzul wah Joorzul - An in-game Dragon to Mortal Dictionary
summary: Adds a book to the game that contains a the entire dragon alphabet as well as all known common translations.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60915-3-1419064377.png[/img]
Adds a book to the game that contains the entire dragon alphabet as well as all known common translations.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60915-1-1419064665.jpg[/img]

Add it to your game via console.

player.additem xx000d62 1 ;Dovahzul wah Joorzul

Replace xx with the mod's load order. Text after ; not required, that's just a label if you want to make a bat file.

[size=6]Start at 10 minutes 36 seconds:[/size]
[youtube]BnypXcnhTuk[/youtube]

[size=5]Credits[/size]
Thuum.org - dragon alphabet font and translations
Dovah Zul Wiki - further translations
author: XunAmarox

files.changelogHtml: Minor corrections. A "/" after "Mine" was removed and an extra "Mine - Dii" was removed.
